terms.name: Afterlife

seo.title: Afterlife Videos: Science & Experiences of the Spirit World
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of life afterlife videos covering science, research, afterlife entities and potential evidence of the spirit world after we die

terms.body: Where does our consciousness go when we die? Investigate evidence of the afterlife, testimonies of near-death experiences, and the science surrounding non-local consciousness.

terms.name: Astral Projection

seo.title: Astral Projection

terms.body: Many intrepid explorers of consciousness have ventured into realms beyond physical reality. Some call this an out of body experience, others astral projection or astral travel. No matter the name, there are worlds beyond own our waiting to be explored. Discover what lies in the realms beyond our corporeal world and how you can achieve astral projection.

terms.name: Chakras

seo.title: Exploring Chakras: Opening, Balancing & Cleansing
seo.description: The human chakra system can open with attention and cultivation. Explore chakra opening with mantra, meditation, and yogic practices.

terms.body:
Many worldly traditions, such as Vedic, Taoism, and Buddhism have long recognized a complex system of subtle energy centers in the human body called Chakras, Sanskrit for "wheel" or "circle."
Practitioners of these traditions have learned how to cultivate and open the chakra system with yogic practices and meditation. Explore the benefits and techniques for developing the chakras, including balancing the body’s subtle and gross elements, taming runaway emotions and reactivity; even spiritual illumination.

terms.name: Channeling

seo.title: What is channeling? Can it be learned?
seo.description: Channeling is found in esoteric traditions worldwide. Learn more about channeling mediums and their messages for humanity.

terms.body: Ordinary people from all walks of life have described unexpectedly becoming conduits for ascended masters and guides. Channeling is not a recent phenomenon -- the delphic oracles of ancient Greece may have channeling messages from other dimensions, and for centuries, the Dalai Lamas of Tibet have consulted their Nechung Oracle for guidance. Explore channeling practices, channelers and their messages on Gaia. "All is well. You did not come here to fix a broken world. You came here to live a wonderful life. Relax a little and let it all in, and begin to see the universe present you with all that you have asked for." ~ Abraham, channeled by Esther Hicks

terms.name: Divination

seo.title: Divination: Explore the I-Ching, tarot, and dowsing
seo.description: Divination practices can be found in every human culture, both ancient and modern. Learn more about divination arts and their practitioners.

terms.body:
The word "divination" is derived from the Latin divinus, "of a god.” A mid-14c. French deviner was a soothsayer — one with supernatural insight. 

Throughout history, on every continent, humans have used divination systems in attempts to discern the future or reveal the unknown. Chance encounters with animals, astrology, observed water currents, dowsing, casting bones, and "cartomancy," better known as tarot, are a few examples. 

Browse Gaia's rich collection of videos and content dedicated to divination arts. Explore tarot, astrology, shamanic divination practices and fortune telling, the I Ching, dowsing, and palmistry in depth. 

"To divine is to imagine the world rightly, to see past the illusion that we are separate from the entire fabric of reality."
	~ Gwendolyn Womack, The Fortune Teller

terms.name: Lucid Dreaming

seo.title: What is lucid dreaming practice? What do dreams mean?
seo.description: Explore the practice and benefits of lucid dreaming, how to achieve it, along with how to interpret dreams.

terms.body:
Roughly one-third of our lives are spent sleeping. What if we learned to use sleep to practice goal attainment, heal the body and mind, and explore dream messages? What could we learn about ourselves if we understood the language of dreams? 

While lucid dreamers use dreamstates as performance rehearsal spaces, or for deep meditation, problem solving, and artistic inspiration, they universally report that lucid dreaming is fun. Imagine waking up in a dream to fly — or, as described by meditation masters, when dreaming of being chased by a tiger, to instead become the tiger?

Explore the possibilities of those most human of activities, sleep and dreaming, on Gaia.

"All men whilst they are awake are in one common world: but each of them, when he is asleep, is in a world of his own."  
~Plutarch

terms.name: Mind Potential

seo.title: Learn to unlock the true potential of your brain.
seo.description: The full potential of the human mind is unknown. Learn to unlock and retrain your brain, and how to strengthen the mind.

terms.body:
What is neuroplasticity? Can we learn to be better learners? Do we really understand the full potential of the brain?Learn to intentionally evolve the mind and brain to hack problem-solving, overcome habits, change thought patterns, improve creativity, and stay inspired.

"The human brain has 100 billion neurons, each neuron connected to ten thousand other neurons. Sitting on your shoulders is the most complicated object in the known universe."	
~ Michio Kaku

terms.name: Pineal Gland

seo.title: Pineal Gland (Third Eye): Acivitation & the Soul
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of pineal gland videos covering how to activate your third eye, decalcify and get in touch with your soul.

terms.body: Study the science and Illuminati conspiracy theories surrounding the eye of Horus or third-eye chakra now called the pineal gland. Explore its manipulation with meditation, DMT, and even fluoride.

terms.name: Psychedelics

seo.title: Do psychedelic drugs hold a key to enlightenment?
seo.description: Once taboo psychedelic drugs may be invaluable for treatment of mental illness, addiction, and depression.

terms.body:
Albert Hoffman, the Swiss chemist who discovered the LSD molecule, believed that with the correct use, the drug was a gift to humanity from god. But the drug, and hallucinogenic substances in general, were demonized and ultimately controlled. 

But shamanic cultures have long used natural hallucinogens — anthropologists believe that mushrooms shared by Arctic shamans at winter solstices may account for a saint with flying reindeer, our present-day Santa Claus. 
  
Modern research has circled back, and is looking at these substances with new eyes as possible treatments for addiction, chronic depression, and to prepare hospice patients for death without anxiety. 

Learn about sacred hallucinogenic practices such as ayahuasca and current psychedelic research into "microdosing" for mental health issues.

"I believe that if people would learn to use LSD's vision-inducing capability more wisely, under suitable conditions, in medical practice and in conjunction with meditation, then in the future this problem child could become a wonderchild."
~ Albert Hoffman

terms.name: Psychic Abilities

seo.title: Are we capable of learning to be psychic?
seo.description: Can we become psychic, or do we have to be born with it?

terms.body: Psychic power allows us to access information directly from the universe, and we’re all born with these intuitive abilities. From telepathy to telekinesis, clairvoyance to clairsentience, the expanded use of our minds knows only the bounds we choose. Many have discovered personal psychic capacities for animal communication, criminal investigation, or medical intuition, and the CIA and KGB have both conducted research to learn whether psychics could use "remote viewing" to function as spies. Moreover, evidence indicates we can hone these skills. Explore Gaia’s center for psychic phenomena and abilities to learn more.

terms.name: Universal Consciousness

seo.title: Are we each part a universal collective consciousness?
seo.description: Is there an absolute, unified consciousness underlying our universe? How can we experience that vast singularity?

terms.body:
Science, physics, and spirituality are at last meeting each other through the search for universal consciousness. Scientists want to know why flocks of birds behave as if guided by a single impulse. Physicists are learning that non-local consciousness influences quantum particles, regardless of distance in time and space. Yogis, mystics, and meditators seek to enter into a state of union with the divine, or universal, mind, called chaitanya, the cosmic intelligence.

Explore the luminous intersection of quantum theory, physics, and spirit in Gaia’s curated library of content dedicated to universal consciousness.

"All is sentient being. Grass, trees, land, sun, moon, and stars are all mind." 
~ Dogon, founder of Soto Zen Buddhism.

terms.name: Alternative Realities

seo.title: Alternate realities, Parallel Universe, 4th Dimension
seo.description: Do alternate realities and parallel universes exist? Explore 4th dimension research, quantum physics and emerging theory with world renowned researchers at Gaia.

terms.body:
Do alternate realities and parallel universes exist? What lies beyond the human perceptual range? While some are born with or acquire the ability to perceive other dimensions, many of us are blind to what we cannot discern with our tactile senses. Join us in exploring these worlds beyond our "normal" perceptual reality.

"If the doors of perception were cleansed, everything would appear as it is...infinite."
~ William Blake

terms.name: Holographic Universe

seo.title: Do we live in a holographic universe?
seo.description: Is the universe a virtual reality matrix? Breakthroughs in physics and quantum theory suggest it might be. Explore Gaia’s content to learn more.

terms.body:
Is reality a "relative" concept? What is the relationship between time and space? And within that vastness, where do daily challenges, traffic, livelihood, grocery shopping, and the fixtures of "ordinary" life fit in? Explore theories of simulated realities, fractals, and space and time in a holographic universe. Learn how human perception and intention affect and interact with relative and absolute time and space, and how, upon inspection, an underlying profound geometry emerges.

"We are almost definitely living in a Matrix-style simulation."
~ Elon Musk

terms.name: Ancient Egypt

seo.title: Hidden History of Ancient Egypt Videos
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of videos covering the hidden history of egypt, ancient egyptian secrets, the pyramids, advanced technology and civilization.

terms.body: Egyptology dismisses all that deviates from mainstream historical theories. We don’t. Examine the secrets of the pyramids, the sphinx, and the hieroglyphs for evidence of suppressed technologies and hidden human origins.

terms.name: Ancient Lost Technology

seo.title: Ancient Wisdom, Technology & Knowledge Videos
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of ancient wisdom videos covering ancient technology, knowledge, list information and suppressed origins of civilization.

terms.body: The ancients left us glimpses into lost technology, from the Pyramids to the Christian mythos. Are the secrets of our origins hidden in Egyptian, Spartan, Assyrian, Toltec, and Sumerian artifacts?

terms.name: Ancient Symbols

seo.title: Illuminati Symbols (Videos): Secrets, Societies & Symbolism
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of illuminati videos covering secret societies and their symbolic code to pass on secret knowledge of their machinations and agendas

terms.body: From secret signs and occult symbols to Egyptian carryovers on our money, decipher the numbers and masonic codes used by secret societies to further their agenda.

terms.name: Ancient Civilizations Decoded

seo.title: Ancient Civilizations Decoded

terms.body:
The Earth never reveals her secrets before she is ready.  Now, in an era of ever-increasing technological sophistication, we are uncovering that which has remained hidden for aeons — civilizations, cultures, and mythologies beyond imaging.

Take the journey to destinations that have been invisible or the stuff of myth and fiction, seemingly lost in time. Learn about discoveries made on ocean floors, within complex cave systems, and on mountain tops or in deserts. Follow the decoding of maps using geometry, astronomy, and the geologic record. Explore ancient systems of gods, kings, and rulers that have long since passed beyond memory with Gaia’s Ancient Civilizations content.

seo.title: Archeological Investigations

terms.name: Indigenous Cultures

seo.title: Indigenous Cultures: Anthropology Videos & Ancient Cultures
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of anthropology videos covering indigenous and ancient cultures from around the world.

terms.body: Dig into a compilation of documentaries examining our cultural differences with forensic, physical, and anthropological research revealing insights into indigenous cultures from around the world.

terms.name: Magic & Mysteries

seo.title: Magic & Mysteries

terms.body: Our world is full of mysteries and magic. Over the years, luminaries have stepped forward to show us the ways of focused intention and energy projection. In this special collection we learn, from proficient teachers, how we can tap into the fabric of reality and shape the course of events in accordance to Will.

terms.name: Megaliths & Sacred Sites

seo.title: Sacred Sites: Videos of Sacred Locations in the World
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of videos on sacred sites throughout the world, their function, who built them and why, what we can gain from them today.

terms.body: Visit sacred sites around the world to examine ancient architecture that incorporates geometric ley lines, astronomy, and calendrics that make their origins, placement, possible purposes, and designers a modern mystery.

terms.name: Our Origin

seo.title: What does hidden archeology say about hfuman origins?
seo.description: Recent and past archaeological discoveries reveals evidence that contradicts long-accepted theories, both scientific and theological.

terms.body:
Beliefs about the origins of human life have been driven by religion and conventional science. Do we really know the truth about the creation of our species? Archeological findings that contradict prevailing beliefs have been suppressed, but point to beginnings beyond imagining — perhaps even off-world. Explore hidden archaeological evidence that challenges doctrinal and academic theories and may reveal that we are far more than we imagined.

"Most of our ancestors were not perfect ladies and gentlemen. The majority of them weren't even mammals."
~ Robert Anton Wilson

terms.name: Sacred Geometry

seo.title: Sacred Geometry Videos: Universe, Nature & Architecture
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of sacred geometry videos bringing dimensions and proportions observed in nature into sacred spaces to invoke the divine within.

terms.body: From the golden ratio to incorporating natural geometry into sacred spaces and architecture, this body of work focuses on the golden mean for honoring and connecting with divine design.

terms.name: Shamans

seo.title: Shamanism is part of indigenous spirituality worldwide.
seo.description: What is shamanism? What is the history of shamanism? Meet shamans from Peru to Asia.

terms.body:
The word "shaman" is from the indigenous Siberian language, Evenki. Shamanism describes practices of entering altered states of awareness to interact with spirit worlds, returning with knowledge, guidance, and healing for the shaman’s tribe and individual members. Shamans have been called witch doctors, medicine men, and curanderos, but fundamental shamanic principles are shared by all. 

Explore shamanic traditions from the Americas, the Himalayas, Central Asia, and Hawaii on Gaia.

"Humans are a part of creation and shamanism is our way of connecting with the whole." 
~ Will Adcock

terms.name: Angels

seo.title: Angel Videos: Encounters, Communicating & Guidance
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of videos covering angels including encounters, their communication, guidance, and the clarity they bring to our lives.

terms.body: Examine encounters with demons, and explore guidance from guardian angels as experts in angel communication and therapy — including Doreen Virtue — share what it means to talk to divine beings.

terms.name: Boosting Spiritual Resources

seo.title: Boosting Spiritual Resources

terms.body: With recent events, it can be confusing to know how to stay in a state of health and wellbeing. Boosting your spiritual resources can help to improve your healing potential. For now, just for these brief moments, you are empowered to turn your mind inward. To set your inner world to a place of peace and aligned with higher being. Then watch as the world around you becomes a reflection of your own spiritual practice.

terms.name: Divine Feminine

seo.title: Divine Feminine

terms.body: The goddess is alive and well! From ages of old to her reawakening in the modern world, take a deep dive into the magic and mystery of the divine feminine. Our team of experts discuss the many faces of the sacred feminine from Sophia with the origin of the universe to Mary Magdalene, and the foundation of the new world. Join us to discover how the divine feminine manifests in your life.

terms.name: Eastern Spirituality

seo.title: Eastern Spirituality Videos: Thoughts & Beliefs
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of eastern spirituality videos, covering thoughts and beleif systems such as buddhism, hinduism, taoism, sikhism, and more.

terms.body: Examine Eastern philosophy and practices with teachers, philosophers, and scholars of Buddhism, Hinduism, Taoism, and Sikhism. From meditation to mythos, this spiritual wisdom transforms mainstream thought.

terms.name: Esoterics

seo.title: Occult Videos: Arcane Legends & Esoteric Knowledge
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of occult videos covering thought leaders of esoteric knowledge, arcane legends, alchemists and much more.

terms.body: From the origins of NASA to the true secrets of the alchemists, the thought leaders of the occult, and its followers, strategically feed gnostic wisdom, mythology, and esoteric mysteries into the mainstream.

terms.name: Intention & Co-Creation

seo.title: Learn to consciously use the power of intention.
seo.description: What is the power of intention? Does the law of attraction really work? Explore practical methods of manifestation at Gaia.

terms.body:
New physics and evolving quantum theory clearly demonstrates that deliberate intention directly influences quantum particle behavior. Yet practical application of this phenomena has been elusive for many. Connect the dots by exploring teachings and meditations on co-creation, and deepen your understanding of this untapped human capacity, how to access it, and how to apply it in your personal reality. With the right intentions, humans can change literally change the world.

"Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change."
~ Wayne Dyer

terms.name: Meditation

seo.title: Learn beginning meditation from experts.
seo.description: Learning meditation may offer answers to life’s challenges. Explore Gaia’s library of meditation content and instruction to learn more.

terms.body:
Shoshin is a word from Zen Buddhism meaning "beginner's mind." This state of open willingness is the ideal place for entering the mediator’s path. 
With more than 3,000 published studies on the mental, emotional, and physical benefits of regular meditation, including emotional resilience and well-being, ADHD management, improved memory and retention, reduced blood pressure and increased longevity, the question becomes, "why wouldn’t I meditate?" 
Explore entering the path of meditation with Gaia’s wealth of instruction and teachings from established, respected contemplative masters.

"In the beginner’s mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert’s there are few." 
~ Shunryu Suzuki

terms.name: Mindfulness

seo.title: Mindfulness Videos: Build Awareness & Consciousness
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of mindfulness videos focused on helping you improve consciousness, awareness, learn to meditate and improve your daily life.

terms.body: Learn to exercise mindfulness with guided training and how to practices for beginners as well as exercises, meditations, techniques, and activities using the psychology and benefits of conscious living.

terms.name: Nature & Animals

seo.title: Nature & Animals

terms.body: Within the natural world is a deep wisdom that reminds us of who we are in the whole of creation. When we connect with animals, we bring healing not only to our beloved companions, but to ourselves and loved ones. We invite you to take a step away from the hustle and bustle of our daily lives and explore your connection the natural world all around and within you.

terms.name: Spiritual Teachers

seo.title: Spiritual Teachers (Videos): Living Masters
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of videos from spiritual masters, teachers and luminaries like michael beckwith, deepak chopra, and more. Find guidance now.

terms.body: Expand your spiritual path with wisdom from modern luminaries including Michael Beckwith and Deepak Chopra. These time-honored insights help carry you through the difficult and mundane into transcendence, ascension, and peace.

terms.name: World Religions

seo.title: World Religions (Videos)
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of videos covering the major relgions of the world, including Hinduism, Christianity, Islam and other top religions.

terms.body: Take a high-level look at religion and science, or pull wisdom from faiths and philosophies from the Catholic Church to Eastern teachings in Buddhism, Hinduism, Taoism, or Sikhism.

terms.name: Yoga Off the Mat

seo.title: Off the Mat: Videos Supporting Yoga in Daily Life
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of videos supporting yoga off the mat and in daily life. Futher your yoga practice into your every day experience.

terms.body: Everything changes when we practice yoga beyond asana, carrying mindfulness off of the mat and into lives we infuse with yogic wisdom and loving kindness. Empower your transformation these documentaries.

terms.name: Spiritual Alchemy

seo.title: Spiritual Alchemy Videos: Esoteric Spirituality & Soul Transformation
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of spiritual alchemy videos covering esoteric spirituality, soul transformation and more to expand human consciousness.

terms.body: Could the true magic of the philosopher’s stone lie in awakening spiritual growth? Examine transformation and awakening through esoteric alchemy and transcendence/ascension into light energy.

terms.name: Aging & Longevity

seo.title: Advances in Longevity Videos: Life Extension & Immortality
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of life extension videos covering longevity research, the science of immortality, and advances in the human quest to live forever.

terms.body: From the fountain of youth to what we know about telomeres and longevity, see the science and research exploring life extension, growing old, and immortality.

terms.name: Ayurveda

seo.title: Ayurvedic Medicine: Videos (Introduction & Ayurveda Recipes)
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of ayurveda videos, covering ayurvedic medicine, the background of ayurveda, how it's used, recipes, treatments, and more.

terms.body: Ayurvedic medicine is an ancient practice aimed at harnessing the mind-body relationship to heal and promote longevity. Use these videos as Ayurveda’s guide to your dosha, diet, sleep, balance, and connection to nature.

terms.name: Breathing

seo.title: Breathing and Breathwork in Yoga and Meditation
seo.description: Breath and breathing are the heart of yoga and mindfulness meditation. Explore the benefits of conscious breathing as the essence of realization at Gaia.

terms.body:
Breath is life. Humans can endure periods of food and water deprivation, but without oxygen and the breath, we’re effectively gone in minutes. Ancient yogis understood the power and nature of conscious breathing and harnessed breathwork as an essential component of pranayama yogic practices. Meditation masters taught the use of  the breath as the essence of mindfulness meditation exercises. Join us in exploring the benefits of breathing and breathwork practices from diverse esoteric spiritual and yogic traditions. 

"Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor."
~ Thich Nhat Hanh

terms.name: Cancer

seo.title: Are alternative cancer therapies effective?
seo.description: Traditional medicine has dominated cancer treatment since 1906, but health professionals and patients are seeking alternative and holistic therapies.

terms.body:
Most have been touched, directly or indirectly, by cancer. For  many, conventional treatment is worse than the disease. Cancer treatment research has remained tightly in the grip of evidence-based and profit-driven medical models to the point of the suppression of natural treatments and cures, and persecution of those who innovate alternatives to chemotherapy drugs and radiation. Explore the vast body of cancer knowledge that lies beyond the boundaries of conventional western medicine, including naturopathic medicine, yoga, diet, meditation, and natural immune-supporting substances. 

"For every drug that benefits a patient, there is a natural substance that can achieve the same effect."
~ Dr. Carl C. Pheiffer

terms.name: Energy Healing

seo.title: Energy Healing Videos: Spirituality, Physical & Emotional
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of energy healing videos, offering spiritual-based practices for healing the spiritual being to create physical healing.

terms.body: Shamans, healers, and sages bring us wisdom from nature to our chakras. Study with the masters and mystics who help others heal the emotional energy body of their spiritual beings to manifest physical healing.

terms.name: Immunity Support

seo.title: Immunity Support

terms.body: The world’s leading experts share information, tips, tools, recipes, and meditations to reduce stress and boost your immune system.

terms.name: Nutrition

seo.title: How do we protect our health in a fast food world?
seo.description: Food research reveals that our health is directly impacted by agribusiness and the politics of food. Take charge of your health and happiness with your diet.

terms.body:
Intentional, healthy lifestyle and diet can improve mood, enhance spiritual practice — possibly even enhance longevity and reverse disease. What benefits do raw-food diets, detox programs, veganism, and vegetarianism offer? 

And what about the politics of food? Is world hunger avoidable? Who controls the food supply, and what is corporate agribusiness? Explore the world of alternative dietary practices, diets to support spirituality, natural supplements, and the economics and politics of food. 

"Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food."
~Hippocrates

terms.name: Optimal Health

seo.title: Optimal Health

terms.body: How do you discover your own path of wellbeing and vitality to achieve optimal health? The road is different for everyone and is an enduring, life-long mission. We invite you to sit with experts, from various health-related fields, who share the fruits of their research on nutrition, supplements, dentistry, detoxing, and unlocking our full health potential. What you may discover could change every aspect of your life.

terms.name: Pain Management

seo.title: Can yoga help relieve chronic pain naturally?
seo.description: New and old methods point the way to natural pain relief without drugs. Explore pain relief alternatives like yoga and meditation.

terms.body:
Is pain a necessary evil of the human condition? Is our pain related to emotional blockages? Or an expression of unresolved trauma issues? Can we overcome and master pain?

Yoga, acupuncture, and meditation can all become weapons in the battle against pain. Even hypnosis, neuro-linguistic programming, and emotional freedom techniques (tapping) have been of value to those experiencing chronic pain. Explore natural, drug-free methods of pain control and perhaps find the key to relief. 

"Pain is inevitable, suffering is optional."
~Buddhist proverb

terms.name: Plant Medicine

seo.title: Plant Medicine Videos: Natural, Spiritual & Sacred
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of plant medicine videos focused on natural plant-based medicines believed to hold spiritual and sacred potential to heal our bodies

terms.body: Expand your understanding of holistic wellness with sacred and spiritual wisdom from shamans, healers, and students of healing who use traditional medicine, ayurveda, and even ayahuasca to cure illness.

terms.name: Sound Healing

seo.title: Sound Healing Videos: Vibrational & Frequency Healing | Gaia
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of sound healing videos, covering vibrational healing and how sounds and frequencies are used to heal the body, mind and soul.

terms.body: Watch as vibrations, like the Taoists’ six healing sounds, combine with meditations to heal and support mind, body, spirit, and emotional health in a sacred therapy used from music to qigong.

terms.name: Stress Relief

seo.title: How to use yoga or meditation for natural stress relief.
seo.description: Learn yoga, meditation, and breathing practices to naturally calm and reduce stress for improved health and wellbeing.

terms.body:
Has the human nervous system caught up with evolving technology? Does our pace and speed cause stress by drawing us away from our natural patterns and rhythms? Does media-triggered fear add additional weight to stress burdens? And most importantly, how does stress impact health, wellbeing, and immune function, to name a few?

Explore yoga, meditation, breathing techniques, qigong, and ayurveda as tools for natural stress release, improved health, and self-care during these stressful times.

"If the problem can be solved, why worry? If the problem cannot be solved, worrying will do you no good." 
~ Śāntideva

terms.name: Be The Change

seo.title: Inspirational Videos: Be the Change
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of inspirational videos showcasing exceptional videos exemplifying what it means to "be the change."

terms.body: To see the humanity at its best, we must transform from the inside out. Meet the exceptional men and women who inspire a new definition of success every day they work to make a difference in the world.

terms.name: Conscious Parenting

seo.title: Conscious Parenting Videos: Spiritual Parenting & Child Raising
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of conscious parenting videos covering spiritual parenting and raising gifted and "special needs" children in today's modern society.

terms.body: How does technology affect young minds? Sensitive spiritual beings — our indigo and crystal children — require conscious parents and holistic care to tend to their special needs. To help them, we learn.

terms.name: Emotional Healing

seo.title: Emotional Healing

terms.body: To see the humanity at its best, we must transform from the inside out. Learn to exercise mindfulness with guided training and how-to practices for beginners as well as meditations and techniques using the psychology and benefits of conscious living.

terms.name: Finding Happiness

seo.title: Finding Happiness Videos: Being Happy & Creating Positivity
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of videos about finding happiness, covering ways to create happiness, cultivate positivity and be happier in your daily life.

terms.body: When we choose to live in joy, we do not “find” happiness. It becomes something we cultivate with wisdom — more than an inspiring quote — a state of mind and a way of being. Find that guidance here.

terms.name: Heart-Centered Living

seo.title: Heart-Centered Living Vidoes: Rebalancing the Emotional Self
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of heart-centered living videos and improve your connection with your emotional self and a heart-centered rebalancing of your life.

terms.body: To experience the business of life from a healthy heart, we pick up tools of meditation, counseling, healing, massage, and hypnotherapy. Study these techniques as you balance living with loving kindness.

terms.name: Inspirational People

seo.title: Inspirational People Videos: Most Inspiring Lives
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of videos about inspirational people offering profiles of people who live life in such a way that inspires others.

terms.body: Find hope as you connect with the brilliant hearts and minds who inspire success, courage, and love as children, with disabilities, and even from places of fame. These are today’s true leaders.

terms.name: Inspiring Documentaries

seo.title: nspirational Documentaries to Fuel Your Journey
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of inspiring documentary videos that will keep you growing and advancing on your personal journey to life fulfillment.

terms.body: Become a student of the best documentaries about health, entrepreneurs, travel, fashion, photography, running, food, art, sports, and service. Perfect for adults and children, here we find inspiration.

terms.name: Manifesting Abundance

seo.title: Manifesting Success Videos: Creating Success without Money
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of manifesting success videos, covering how to create and find success, and give purpose to your life without focusing on money.

terms.body: Celebrate daily success in life as you find motivation in stories of top achievers’ hard work, perspective and acceptance. You just manifested guidance, powerful quotes, deeper meaning, and inspiration.

terms.name: Sacred Relationships

seo.title: Sacred Relationships Videos: Love & Interaction
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of sacred relationship videos covering an approach to relationships that takes into account that we are spiritual beings.

terms.body: When we’re making lasting love, this guidance from leaders in conscious relationships helps us nurture that sacred bond with our soul mate. Explore the spiritual boundaries that make love, love.

terms.name: Sustainability

seo.title: Environmental Awareness Videos: Science, Issues & Action
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of environmental videos covering important environmental issues, building awareness and taking action to create a healthier planet.

terms.body: As bees disappear and our environment transforms, what we know about eco-friendly science, law, and management could change the world. Does the Environmental Protection Agency have a hand on our health?

terms.name: Aliens

seo.title: Alien Videos: Abductions, Encounters & Agenda Among Us

terms.name: Cabal

seo.title: Cabal Videos: New World Order, Shadow Government
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of videos about the cabal, suggesting potential influence and machinations of shadow governemnts and secret societies.

terms.body: Powerful elites won’t disclose strategic deception or historical disinformation, but a mass consciousness shift looms as we expose shadow governments, extraterrestrial influences, technologies, and truths that will change everything.

terms.name: Chemtrails

seo.title: Chemtrail Videos: Conspiracies of Weather Control & More
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of videos about chemtrails and whether there is proof and evidence of the conspiracy theories such as weather control and more.

terms.body:
Chemtrails or contrails? Conspiracy or coincidence?

White streaks crisscross our skies, every day. Who is behind them, and why? Some claim that these are responsible for respiratory illnesses, decreased cognitive function, and weather modification. We invite you to examine the evidence, as collected by experts in wide-ranging fields of study and research, to explore what is going on.

terms.name: Contact Experiences

seo.title: Are humans in contact with aliens and ETs?
seo.description: UFOs and extraterrestrials reports abound. Contactees describe telepathic, physical, and voice communications with non-humans, some friendly, some hostile.

terms.body:
For many, the question is no longer whether extraterrestrials are in contact with humans, but which extraterrestrials, where, and how?
"We no longer have to ask priests and philosophers what we should believe about extraterrestrial life," said Bernard Oliver of the Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence Institute (SETI).
Witnesses report unimaginable experiences ranging from visual sightings to intimate contact, conversations -- even visits to non-human craft. While reports of these events have been repressed by governments and the military throughout the 20th century, the U.S. government has recently opened the Pandora's Box of disclosure, allowing military personnel to describe UFO encounters on main-stream media. Explore Gaia's exhaustive content dedicated to documented witness reports and contact experiences — from sightings to physical abductions — even off-world travel.

"There are more things on heaven and earth, Horatio, than are dreamt of in your philosophy."
~ William Shakespeare, Hamlet

terms.name: Crop Circles

seo.title: Crop Circle Videos: Creation, Decoding & Explainations
seo.description: Browse Gaia's collection of crop circle videos covering how they are created, who is behind them, decoding their meaning and explaning their signifcance.

terms.body: See crop circles around the world, hear the theories behind the who and how of their creation, and explore how the secret messages in these phenomena may be interpreted.

terms.name: Disclosure

seo.title: When will official disclosure of UFOs begin?
seo.description: Modern government agencies have denied the existence of UFOs and non-human life forms. When will official UFO disclosure begin?

terms.body:
Before modern history, petroglyphs interpreted to be depictions of UFOs and extraterrestrials were left on the Indian Subcontinent, Australia, Europe, and North America. Throughout the renaissance and beyond, master painters were apparently free to depict what we refer to as UFOs in religious paintings. Airborne objects in these works are particularly remarkable considering human mechanical flight had not been invented. 

These depictions, now part of the historic record, beg the question; “Why has the presence of UFOs been denied by 20th cen. governments and military agencies? Why has our government classified research and events such as the 1947 Roswell crash? Why is the entire topic stamped "top secret?"

 Explore Gaia’s wealth of UFO content to learn the backstories of UFO activity world-wide, as well as official tactics to suppress information and discredit witnesses.

"I don’t laugh at people anymore when they say they’ve seen UFOs. I’ve seen one myself."
~ President Jimmy Carter

terms.name: Financial System

seo.title: Are there hidden conspiracy secrets at the fed?
seo.description: What goes on behind the closed doors of the federal treasury? What do the symbols on the dollar bill mean? Who are the banksters?

terms.body:
Where did money come from? Who invented it? Who controls it? Can we live without it? 
Financial systems are the engines of first-world cultural paradigms, but an unquestioning acceptance of the supremacy of banks, government treasuries, fiscal institutions, and economic models have led to a world wherein currency and financial resources are in the hands of a very few, yet essential to survival for all.
Learn about financial power, shadow money schemes, esoteric monetary symbolism from Babylonian times, "banksters,," and consumerist entrainment tactics. Look further and explore expanded ideas of sacred economy, financial freedom, subversive cryptocurrencies — even ancient currency-free exchange models such as Ubuntu. 

"Money doesn’t talk, it swears."
~ Bob Dylan

terms.body: How does some science and technology go mainstream while cancer cures, free energy, and critical advanced sciences flounder? From Nikola Tesla to the big business agenda, discover suppressed technology.

terms.name: Free Energy

seo.title: Free Energy

terms.body: From Zero Point Energy devices to reverse-engineered extraterrestrial technology, there are many insiders that say free energy is real and should be available to all. But major institutions and governments are doing everything that they can to keep this tech out of the hands of the public. Examine the evidence presented by insiders who claim to have worked with free energy technology.

terms.body: Come together with super-cool students of new information technology, the brilliant minds who take us through our computers, beyond space and time, into a fun future full of potential.
